item.title: One Week After Black Friday, Dyson V11 Quietly Hits New Record Low on Amazon
item.content:encoded:
Black Friday came and went, but Amazon continues pushing deals on premium brands throughout December which happens to be its biggest sales month of the year. The Dyson V11 Origin currently sits at $399 instead of its usual $629 which is a record low on this cordless vacuum that brings serious suction power to your cleaning routine.

This model delivers 185 air watts of power across three modes, and handles both quick daily cleanups and deep weekend cleaning sessions. Over 40,000 units sold in the past month as people realize Dyson‚Äôs engineering justifies the premium over budget stick vacuums that die after six months. The combination of 60-minute runtime, detangling brush head, and HEPA filtration creates a cleaning tool that handles pet hair, allergens, and debris across all floor types.

See at Amazon

What 185 Air Watts Does to Change Your Cleaning Experience

The suction power measured in air watts represents actual cleaning capability rather than motor wattage marketing numbers that don‚Äôt correlate with performance. This V11 Origin pulls 60% more power than previous Dyson V-series models, and creates enough airflow to lift embedded dirt from carpet fibers and pull debris from grout lines in hard flooring. You can feel the difference immediately when vacuuming high-traffic areas where foot traffic grinds dirt deep into carpet pile, as the motorbar cleaner head actually extracts material that cheaper vacuums just push around.

Three power modes let you clean in different ways without wasting battery on tasks that don‚Äôt need full power. Auto mode automatically changes the suction power based on the type of floor and the amount of dirt, balancing cleaning performance with battery life to make it last for years. Eco mode lets you clean your whole house or a large area for up to 60 minutes at a time, which is great for when you need to run the device for a long time between charges. Boost mode gives you the most suction for tough spots, dirt that has been ground in, or thick carpets that need more power. The LCD screen shows how much time is left for cleaning, down to the second, as well as power mode and maintenance alerts. This way, you always know how much time you have left.

The Motorbar cleaner head has a design that keeps long hair and pet fur from getting stuck in the brush bar: This fixes one of the most annoying things about owning a vacuum. With traditional brush rolls, you have to cut and unwind hair that builds up while you clean. This design, on the other hand, sends hair straight to the dustbin as you vacuum. You can clean rooms with long-haired people or pets that shed without having to stop every few minutes to untangle hair from the brush.

Advanced whole-machine HEPA filtration catches 99.99% of particles as small as 0.3 microns including allergens, dust mites, and fine particulate matter that can cause breathing problems. The sealed filtration system keeps particles that have been caught from getting back into your air through cracks or exhaust. This is very important for people with allergies or respiratory issues.

You can switch to handheld mode in seconds by taking off the wand and attaching tools directly to the main body and because of this flexibility, you don‚Äôt have to get out a separate handheld vacuum for quick cleanups in the car, on the couch, or on the ceiling. The weight and balance are good for handheld use, so you can use it for a long time on stairs or furniture without getting tired in your arms.

This $230 discount makes Dyson‚Äôs engineering and build quality comparable to mid-range cordless vacuums that don‚Äôt have the same suction power, runtime, or filtration as this model. You‚Äôre getting a cleaning tool that will last for years instead of months, and the materials and construction are worth the extra cost compared to disposable-grade options.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/one-week-after-black-friday-dyson-v11-quietly-hits-new-record-low-on-amazon-2000651139

item.title: Lenovo Has No Sale on Its Site, Goes Nearly 80% Off on This 32GB/1TB Model Quietly via Amazon
item.content:encoded:
Black Friday was weeks ago, but December is still Amazon‚Äôs busiest month for sales with new deals coming out every day. This Lenovo V15 G2 laptop is on sale for a record low of $599 instead of its usual price of $2,599 and you won‚Äôt find any discounts even close to this on Lenovo‚Äôs official site. This laptop has 32GB of DDR4 RAM and a 1TB PCIe SSD which makes it a useful everyday machine that can handle work and entertainment without costing a lot of money.

See at Amazon

Why This Memory Setup Makes a Big Difference

In the budget laptop market where 8GB is still common and 16GB is a nice upgrade, the 32GB RAM capacity really stands out: This extra memory space lets you keep a lot of browser tabs open at the same time as Office apps, video conferencing software, photo editing tools, and background processes without them slowing down.

The 1TB PCIe SSD has enough space for large document libraries, photo collections, downloaded courses, and application installations without needing external drives or heavy cloud management. PCIe interface technology makes reading and writing much faster than older SATA SSDs which means that Windows boots up in seconds and apps start right away when you click on them. This storage capacity matters for students storing lecture recordings and project files, professionals managing client documents and presentations, or families sharing one laptop across multiple users with different needs.

The Intel Celeron N4500 processor is good enough for everyday computing tasks and uses little power, which is good for battery life when you‚Äôre in class or working away from an outlet. This dual-core chip has a 4MB cache and can boost speeds up to 2.8GHz and it has enough power for web browsing, editing documents, working with spreadsheets, streaming video, and making calls. The processor can‚Äôt handle video editing, 3D rendering, or modern gaming beyond simple games, but it can handle regular school and office tasks without too many delays.

The 15.6-inch FHD display at 1920√ó1080 resolution shows text crisply enough for extended document work without causing eye strain, and the anti-glare coating reduces reflections from overhead lighting or windows. The thin bezels make the most of the screen space in the chassis and gives it a modern look that doesn‚Äôt look cheap even though it is. Dolby Audio processing through two speakers makes video calls sound clear and YouTube and Netflix sound good enough.

Wi-Fi 6 support makes wireless connections faster and works better in networks that are crowded with a lot of devices trying to use the same bandwidth at the same time. This new standard makes it easier for multiple people to stream content, play games, and make video calls at the same time in dorms, offices, or homes. Bluetooth 5.2 works better with wireless devices like mice, keyboards, and headphones than older Bluetooth versions as it has a longer range and more stable connections. The selection of connections meets real-world needs with USB-A ports for older devices, USB-C ports for newer accessories, HDMI ports for external monitors or projectors, and an ethernet jack for wired connections when Wi-Fi isn‚Äôt available or reliable.

This huge discount off the normal listing price makes a well-configured laptop with lots of RAM and storage affordable while still keeping specs that would normally cost $800‚Äì900 elsewhere. You‚Äôre getting twice as much memory and storage as most other budget laptops, and the machine‚Äôs useful life will be longer than that of cheaper options because it has modern connectivity standards.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/lenovo-has-no-sale-on-its-site-goes-nearly-80-off-on-this-32gb-1tb-model-quietly-via-amazon-2000651129

item.title: Metroid Prime 4 Players Are Discovering The Game Is Filled With Vagina Doors
item.content:encoded:
Metroid Prime 4 Beyond is more mature than your average Nintendo-published first-party game. So players were expecting some violence, sci-fi monsters, and guns. What they might not have been expecting was for so many of the puzzle game‚Äôs doors to look like, umm, well‚Ä¶

As with past Metroid games from Nintendo, a lot of Prime 4‚Äòs presentation is inspired by H.R. Giger‚Äôs designs from the classic sci-fi movie Alien. This is especially evident in Metroid Prime 4‚Äòs first large level, Volt Forge, which contains a lot of Giger-esque architecture and environmental details. But other parts of Prime 4, like the famous artist, seem inspired by other parts of human anatomy, like vaginas. What I‚Äôm trying to say is there are a lot of doors in this game that might make your more prudish grandparents uncomfortable.

‚ÄúLotta vaginas in this game,‚Äù bluntly, but accurately, declared critic Aidan Moher on Bluesky. And he‚Äôs right! In the early portions of Prime 4‚Äòs campaign, you‚Äôll encounter a few different doors that seem inspired by vulvas.  Fans online are now sharing screenshots of doors that look very vaginal online.  Some are large, and some are small. One of these doors even popped up on a subreddit dedicated to highlighting objects and locations that look a bit like vaginas.

Why is all the discourse on Metroid Prime 4 about Miles and not how all the doors are extremely vaginal? Just curious. pic.twitter.com/rLRXbypR92

‚Äî TwoTonTunic (Randyman Machosaveage) (@TwoTonTunic) December 4, 2025

Metroid Prime 4 empieza con Samus despert√°ndose frente a una vagina gigante y teniendo que disparar al cl√≠toris para abrir las compuertas.

Nadie entiende esta franquicia mejor que Retro Studios.

‚Äî Nacho MG (@nachomg.com) 2025-12-04T23:20:38.419Z

MY GAWD #MetroidPrime4 Graphics are absolutely BREATHTAKING üòç

A Masterclass in Visuals at 4K 60fps! One of the best-looking games today on Any Console #NintendoSwitch2 pic.twitter.com/KLiccDb3hf

‚Äî NintenGOD (@AesirMalos) December 4, 2025

Metroid 4 has vagina doors pic.twitter.com/3GhrYvWaTx

‚Äî THANKFUL DAVE üçî (@thankfuldave29) December 4, 2025

thanks vagina temple

happy to see that prime 4 is continuing the tradition of metroid doing the pg13 version of alien's sexual hr giger biomechanica pic.twitter.com/k6zxRsveXj

‚Äî Sam (@Spainkiller) December 5, 2025

Also the yonic imagery is pretty interesting.
Almost like an inverse of Alien's whole thing, which is cool to me since Metroid does take inspiration from that series + Samus' whole thing pic.twitter.com/bPrJvK7XJh

‚Äî Nachtflugel Fatali (@Verumleonhart) December 4, 2025

There are even some doors that feature small bumps at the top that Samus must pull down using her psychic powers to open them.

It‚Äôs all pretty hard to unsee once it‚Äôs been pointed out to you. And honestly, I think most people will pick up on the vagina doors without any help. I‚Äôd pay a lot of money to be in the boardroom with some stuffy Nintendo execs if they are ever sat down and told why, suddenly, vagina door and Prime 4 are trending on social media and Reddit.
